# About

In this section, we will help you to fully personalize the Sign-up form:
- Customizing the styles
- Adding new providers

## Prerequisite 

Please make sure that you have completed the Quick setup. If you have completed it, you should see the following UI when you navigate to `/auth`.

<img width="600px" src="/docs/static/assets/thirdparty/signup-light.png" />
